page.title: 16Dunston Parish Council
page.content: Dunston Parish Council is made up of seven elected members.There is a clerk to the council.The council meets on the first Monday of each month.They discuss local problems and proposed alterations and improvements.Two members are on the governors of Dunston St Peter's School. The council,as part of its jobs,is in charge of the running of the village hall.It is used by a number of clubs: the playgroup,the Ivy club(a club for the over 60's),The Michelle Cooper Dancing School,Janet Ashton School of Dancing,Social Club and indoor bowls club. A local issue at the moment is the proposed oneway system around Middle Street and Back Lane.
